info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued October 09 at 10:15AM AST until October 09 at 5:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat indices of 108 to 111 degrees Fahrenheit are likely. * WHERE...The urban and coastal areas of southern Puerto Rico, and Saint Thomas. * WHEN...Until 5 PM this afternoon * IMPACTS...Heat exhaustion is likely with prolonged exposure. Heat stroke possible.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.
